ValidationRule.description: Created as part of CR00032940 | IT-REQ-1779
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Annual_Revenue_Gain__c = 0 && Annual_Time_Savings_Hours__c = 0 && Annual_Business_Savings__c = 0 && Annual_IT_Savings__c = 0 && Annual_Revenue_Loss_Avoidance__c = 0 && Annual_Cost_Avoidance__c = 0 && ISPICKVAL(Business_Risk_Severity__c, 'No impact')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Add any value in these fields
